title: NS Define AL 170 stretches out longer, mullet enduro+ option for the all-mountain bike
content:
We got a sneak peek at NS Bikes’ reworking of their popular all-mountain trail-to-enduro bike last summer, but the new Define AL 170 takes it to the next level with an even longer-travel version for when not even enduro is enough. Now pairing a 27.5″ rear wheel & 170mm frame travel to a long 180mm […]

The post NS Define AL 170 stretches out longer, mullet enduro+ option for the all-mountain bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
